package.name: Stencil Music Control
package.shortDescription: Media controls for Stencil theme on ios13, 12 and 11

descriptionlist.description: Lock screen, control centre, Music app and other media controls for Stencil theme. Note there are now two subthemes, one for Snowboard, and one for Iconomatic and iThemer.
If you're on anything below 10.3.3, music controls are in the control center package!
